text: Niccolò Orsini (died 18 October 1653) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Ripatransone (1636–1653)."Bishop Niccolò Orsini" Catholic- Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved March 21, 2016."Diocese of San Benedetto del Tronto-Ripatransone-Montalto" Catholic-Hierarchy.org. David M. Cheney. Retrieved February 29, 2016."Diocese of San Benedetto del Tronto–Ripatransone–Montalto" GCatholic.org. Gabriel Chow. Retrieved February 29, 2016. ==Biography== On 22 September 1636, Niccolò Orsini was appointed Bishop of Ripatransone by Pope Urban VIII. On 28 September 1636, he was consecrated bishop by Giovanni Battista Maria Pallotta, Cardinal-Priest of San Silvestro in Capite, with Celso Zani, Bishop Emeritus of Città della Pieve, and Giovanni Battista Scanaroli, Titular Bishop of Sidon, serving as co- consecrators. He served as Bishop of Ripatransone until his death on 18 October 1653. == References == Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Urban VIII Category:1653 deaths
title: Niccolò Orsini (bishop)
